content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• No new structures have been successfully built during this execution cycle. Multiple attempts to craft and place a Lab (the intended research‐supply structure) did not succeed due to inventory shortages and missing sub‐ingredients.
• The agent did reference two pre‐existing smelting units used for resource processing:
 – Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
  • Use-case: Converting iron ore (with coal) into iron plates.
 – Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
  • Use-case: Converting copper ore (with coal) into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage for Entity Retrieval:
 – When calling get_entities, use the proper function signature. Avoid unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or an incorrect number of positional arguments.
• Handling Null Returns:
 – Check that functions returning entity lists do not yield None before iterating. Default to an empty list when no entities are found.
• Lab Placement and Inventory Verification:
 – Ensure that a Lab is present in inventory (or has been successfully crafted) before attempting placement at a desired position.
• Lab Crafting Prerequisites:
 – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available in sufficient quantities. Verify that necessary production processes (such as smelting for iron/copper plates) are complete before beginning Lab crafting attempts.
